languages.text: На Янусе установилась темная власть искателей запретного. Пока устрашенные серфы трудились в полях, в высоких замках премудрые отступники постигали знания ксеносов, учили их грязные языки, приобщались к их культуре. Туманы, рожденные ирригационными установками, сокрыли творящееся зло от праведных.

The dark rule of the seekers of the forbidden was established on Janus. While terrified serfs toiled in the fields, in the lofty castles, wise renegades studied the knowledge of the xenos, learned their filthy language, and embraced their culture. The mists born of irrigation devices hid the evil work from the righteous.
languages.original_text: На Янусе установилась темная власть искателей запретного. Пока устрашенные серфы трудились в полях, в высоких замках премудрые отступники постигали знания ксеносов, учили их грязные языки, приобщались к их культуре. Туманы, рожденные ирригационными установками, сокрыли творящееся зло от праведных.

traits.locale_text: A dark rule of the seekers of the forbidden was established on Janus. While the terrified serfs toiled in the fields, the wise renegades studied the knowledge of the xenos, learned their filthy language and embraced their culture in the lofty castles. The mists born of sprinkler devices hid the evil work from the righteous.

A dark rule of the seekers of the forbidden was established on Janus. While the terrified serfs toiled in the fields, the wise renegades studied the knowledge of the xenos, learned their filthy language and embraced their culture in the lofty castles. The mists born of sprinkler devices hid the evil work from the righteous.

The dark rule of the seekers of the forbidden was established on Janus. While terrified serfs toiled in the fields, in the lofty castles, wise renegades studied the knowledge of the xenos, learned their filthy language, and embraced their culture. The mists born of irrigation devices hid the evil work from the righteous.

The dark rule of the seekers of the forbidden was established on Janus. While terrified serfs toiled in the fields, in the lofty castles, wise renegades studied the knowledge of the xenos, learned their filthy language, and embraced their culture. The mists born of irrigation devices hid the evil work from the righteous.

The dark rule of the seekers of the forbidden was established on Janus. While terrified serfs toiled in the fields, in the lofty castles, wise renegades studied the knowledge of the xenos, learned their filthy language, and embraced their culture. The mists born of irrigation devices hid the evil work from the righteous.

languages.text: 加努斯的统治权，落在了禁忌知识的寻求者手中。当惊恐的农奴在田间与高耸的城堡中辛勤劳作时，那些聪明的叛徒早就吸收了异形的知识，学习了他们邪恶的语言，接受了他们的文化。这所有的邪恶与阴谋，都隐藏在灌溉装置产生的迷雾之中，不为虔诚之人所知。
languages.original_text: The dark rule of the seekers of the forbidden was established on Janus. While terrified serfs toiled in the fields, in the lofty castles, wise renegades studied the knowledge of the xenos, learned their filthy language, and embraced their culture. The mists born of irrigation devices hid the evil work from the righteous.

traits.locale_text: 加努斯的统治权，落在了禁忌知识的寻求者手中。当惊恐的农奴在田间与高耸的城堡中辛勤劳作时，那些聪明的叛徒早就吸收了异形的知识，学习了他们邪恶的语言，接受了他们的文化。这所有的邪恶与阴谋，都隐藏在灌溉装置产生的迷雾之中，不为虔诚之人所知。

languages.text: 禁忌を探求する者の闇の法がヤヌスに確立された。恐怖に怯える農奴が畑であくせく働いている一方、高くそびえ立つ城では賢明な背教者がゼノの知識を研究し、その汚れた言語を習得し、そしてその文化を享受していた。灌漑用機器から発生した霧が邪悪な行いを正義から隠していた。
languages.original_text: The dark rule of the seekers of the forbidden was established on Janus. While terrified serfs toiled in the fields, in the lofty castles, wise renegades studied the knowledge of the xenos, learned their filthy language, and embraced their culture. The mists born of irrigation devices hid the evil work from the righteous.

traits.locale_text: 禁忌を探求する者の闇の法がヤヌスに確立された。恐怖に怯える農奴が畑であくせく働いている一方、高くそびえ立つ城では賢明な背教者がゼノの知識を研究し、その汚れた言語を習得し、そしてその文化を享受していた。灌漑用機器から発生した霧が邪悪な行いを正義から隠していた。

languages.text: Le sombre règne des chasseurs de savoir interdit fut établi sur Janus. Tandis que des serfs terrifiés trimaient dans les champs, dans les châteaux nobles, de sages renégats étudiaient le savoir des xénos, apprenaient leur langue immonde et adoptaient leur culture. Les brumes causées par les appareils d'irrigation dissimulaient le travail malfaisant aux vertueux.
languages.original_text: The dark rule of the seekers of the forbidden was established on Janus. While terrified serfs toiled in the fields, in the lofty castles, wise renegades studied the knowledge of the xenos, learned their filthy language, and embraced their culture. The mists born of irrigation devices hid the evil work from the righteous.

traits.locale_text: Le sombre règne des chasseurs de savoir interdit fut établi sur Janus. Tandis que des serfs terrifiés trimaient dans les champs, dans les châteaux nobles, de sages renégats étudiaient le savoir des xénos, apprenaient leur langue immonde et adoptaient leur culture. Les brumes causées par les appareils d'irrigation dissimulaient le travail malfaisant aux vertueux.

languages.text: El gobierno oscuro de los buscadores de lo prohibido quedó establecido en Janus. Mientras los aterrados siervos trabajaban en los campos, en los altos castillos los sabios renegados estudiaban el saber de los xenos, aprendían su inmundo idioma y aceptaban su cultura. Las nieblas de los dispositivos de riego ocultaban sus malignos actos a los fieles.
languages.original_text: The dark rule of the seekers of the forbidden was established on Janus. While terrified serfs toiled in the fields, in the lofty castles, wise renegades studied the knowledge of the xenos, learned their filthy language, and embraced their culture. The mists born of irrigation devices hid the evil work from the righteous.

traits.locale_text: El gobierno oscuro de los buscadores de lo prohibido quedó establecido en Janus. Mientras los aterrados siervos trabajaban en los campos, en los altos castillos los sabios renegados estudiaban el saber de los xenos, aprendían su inmundo idioma y aceptaban su cultura. Las nieblas de los dispositivos de riego ocultaban sus malignos actos a los fieles.

languages.text: Auf Janus wurde die dunkle Herrschaft der Suchenden nach dem Verbotenen etabliert. Während verängstigte Sklaven auf den Feldern arbeiteten, studierten kluge Abtrünnige in den Prunkschlössern das Wissen der Xenos, erlernten ihre dreckige Sprache und vereinnahmten ihre Kultur. Der Nebel der Bewässerungsgeräte verbarg das böse Werk vor den Rechtschaffenen.
languages.original_text: The dark rule of the seekers of the forbidden was established on Janus. While terrified serfs toiled in the fields, in the lofty castles, wise renegades studied the knowledge of the xenos, learned their filthy language, and embraced their culture. The mists born of irrigation devices hid the evil work from the righteous.

traits.locale_text: Auf Janus wurde die dunkle Herrschaft der Suchenden nach dem Verbotenen etabliert. Während verängstigte Sklaven auf den Feldern arbeiteten, studierten kluge Abtrünnige in den Prunkschlössern das Wissen der Xenos, erlernten ihre dreckige Sprache und vereinnahmten ihre Kultur. Der Nebel der Bewässerungsgeräte verbarg das böse Werk vor den Rechtschaffenen.

languages.text: Janus'ta, yasaklı olanın peşinden koşanların karanlık hükümdarlığı kuruldu. Korku içindeki köleler tarlalarda didinmeye odaklandıysa da, azametli kalelerdeki bilge muhalifler, zenolara dair çalışmalar gerçekleştirdi, onların pis dillerini öğrendi ve kültürlerine kucak açtı. Kötücül eylemler, sulama aygıtlarından çıkan sisler ile doğruculardan gizlendi.
languages.original_text: The dark rule of the seekers of the forbidden was established on Janus. While terrified serfs toiled in the fields, in the lofty castles, wise renegades studied the knowledge of the xenos, learned their filthy language, and embraced their culture. The mists born of irrigation devices hid the evil work from the righteous.
